subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXCFWLOX
WHUS46 KLOX 161522
CFWLOX

COASTAL HAZARD MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
822 AM PDT MON APR 16 2007

CAZ040-041-161630-
/O.CAN.KLOX.CF.S.0005.000000T0000Z-070416T1700Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
822 AM PDT MON APR 16 2007

THE STRONG NORTHWEST FLOW THAT IMPACTED THE COASTAL WATERS ON
SUNDAY HAS RELAXED...AND WITH IT THE SEAS HAVE LOWERED. AS A
RESULT...THE SURF ALONG THE LOS ANGELES AND VENTURA COUNTY COAST
HAS SUBSIDED TO MORE NORMAL HEIGHTS...WHICH SHOULD CONTINUE FOR
THE REST OF THE DAY.

$$

KITTELL
